data.name: Between WIREs
data.detailed_description:
Looming anxiety and an absurd obsession with her mortality causes Emily to spiral down into a dark and inescapable impasse for she believes her unreasonable actions will prevent her own death she obscurely dreamt about when she was a child.
Experience the cathartic and gruesome story of Emily and the many intangible situations she finds herself in as she faces off against countless horrors and creatures that plague her reality.

By bringing elements of classic adventure and survival horror games and putting them through the lens of a modern game, Between WIREs will be sure to deliver a nostalgic yet absolutely unique gaming experience.

Key Features


  • Stay awake long enough to find a safe place to sleep before you find yourself too tired to go on any farther.
  • With no flashlight, you must find a light switch to see what's inside the many dark rooms and halls you encounter on your journey, for you never know what you might accidentally walk into.
  • Conduct rituals and puzzles to collect items and abilities.
  • Fight against Emily's anxiety and instincts so you don't lose control of her and what she does.
  • Fend off or flee from the few but wicked terrors that reside in reality.
  • Vast amounts of replayability with multiple endings and bonus content for completing the game.
  • Full controller and keyboard/mouse support so you can play however you choose.

data.short_description: An obsession with her mortality puts Emily into a morbid, downward spiral for she believes her unreasonable actions will prevent a death she obscurely dreamt about when she was a child.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit Ediition
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz or AMD Athlon™ X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB, or Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Edition
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad 2.7 Ghz or AMD Phenom™ II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 8GB or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent violence and general mature content.
